mdRecord.dcterms:title: School of Medicine, Fourth Year Class, 1957-1958
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First row (l to r): Ronald Bruce Kledzig, Alvin Monnie Kanter, John Wise Wescott, Donald John Kenneweg, Harry Hudnall Ware III, William Earl Strole, Jr., Don Franklin Shreve, Carlos Ray Ayers, Charles Hubert Adams, Ferdinand Baldwin Harrington, Jr., John Alfriend Mapp, Alfred Morton Shulwolf, James Peter King, Jr. Second row (l to r): Stuart Harold Wax, Mary Lou Combs Abram, Veronica Canakar, John Cole, Jr., Paul Edward Ludwig, Mary Del Toro Ludwig, Albert Harrison Luck, William Bryan Pollard, William Stallings, Fulton Williams Fite, Irvin Leonard Posner, Kenneth Douglas Tuck, Richard Dunn Marks, Jr. Third row (l to r): Wayne Douglas Boring, Jr., James Franklin White, Jr., Stan Lee Coleman, Edwin James Harvie, Jr., Fred Arps Vinson, Jr., Thaddeus Lewis Kostubala, Thomas Robert Glasco, William Douglas Clark, John Herbert Dilworth, Benjamin Word, Charles Isaac Sheaffer, Barringer Duncan Marshall, Jr., James Franklin White, Jr. Fourth row (l to r): Edward Elias Gahres, Porter Burks Echols, Jr., Larry William Berman, James Moir Hylton, Donald Pressley Stacks, Hideo Oshiro, Donald John Kenneweg, Hannibal Eldredge Howell, Norman Rosenbaum, Carl Bruce Caplinger, David Deadrick Stone, Thomas Epps Wilson III, Austin Litvak. Fifth row (l to r): Harvey Daniel Lewis, Jr., Clifford Williams Caplan, Edmond Reginald Henelt, William Joseph Hanock, Robert Francis Selden, Jr., Arthur Gaillard Gower III, George Pete Scouras, Frederick Daniel Robinson, Robert Howe Dodd, Robert Eugene Dye, James Vincent Gallagher, Robert Batson Hall.
